content: The Celestial Lotus Seeds are one of the many Soaks you will find for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. They provide an extra healing boost on top of your Gourd if you have them equipped, allowing you to heal beyond what your Drink and Gourd allows.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Celestial_Lotus_Seeds.md', within the main section titled 'Celestial Lotus Seeds'.
The content is as follows:
The Celestial Lotus Seeds are one of the many Soaks you will find for your Gourds in Black Myth: Wukong. They provide an extra healing boost on top of your Gourd if you have them equipped, allowing you to heal beyond what your Drink and Gourd allows.
